verses.verse: Moses <S%H4872><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and <S%H6950><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H1697><s%> "These are the words which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded, <S%H6680><s%> that you should do them. <S%H6213><s%>

<S%H8337><s%> 'Six days <S%H3117><s%> shall work <S%H4399><s%> be done, <S%H6213><s%> but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be a holy day <S%H6944><s%> for you, <S%H7676><s%> a Sabbath of solemn rest <S%H7677><s%> to Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> whoever does <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%> in it shall be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>
You shall kindle <S%H1197><s%> no fire <S%H784><s%> throughout your habitations <S%H4186><s%> on the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>'"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded, <S%H6680><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

<S%H3947><s%> 'Take from among you an offering <S%H8641><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Whoever <S%H3605><s%> is of a willing <S%H5081><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> let him bring <S%H935><s%> it, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh's offering: <S%H8641><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> silver, <S%H3701><s%> brass, <S%H5178><s%>
blue, <S%H8504><s%> purple, <S%H713><s%> scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair,
rams <S%H352><s%>' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red, <S%H119><s%> sea cow <S%H8476><s%> hides, <S%H5785><s%> acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%>
oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light, <S%H3974><s%> spices <S%H1314><s%> for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> and for the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%>
onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> and stones <S%H68><s%> to be set <S%H4394><s%> for the ephod <S%H646><s%> and for the breastplate. <S%H2833><s%>
<S%H2450><s%>"'Let every wise-hearted man <S%H3820><s%> among you come, <S%H935><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded: <S%H6680><s%>

the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> its outer covering, <S%H4372><s%> its roof, <S%H168><s%> its clasps, <S%H7165><s%> its boards, <S%H7175><s%> its bars, <S%H1280><s%> its pillars, <S%H5982><s%> and its sockets; <S%H134><s%>
the ark, <S%H727><s%> and its poles, <S%H905><s%> the mercy seat, <S%H3727><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the screen; <S%H4539><s%>
the table <S%H7979><s%> with its poles <S%H905><s%> and all its vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and the show bread; <S%H6440><s%>
the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> also for the light, <S%H3974><s%> with its vessels, <S%H3627><s%> its lamps, <S%H5216><s%> and the oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light; <S%H3974><s%>

and the altar <S%H4196><s%> of incense <S%H7004><s%> with its poles, <S%H905><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%> the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the door, <S%H6607><s%> at the door of the tabernacle; <S%H4908><s%>

the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> with its grating <S%H4345><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> it poles, <S%H905><s%> and all its vessels, <S%H3627><s%> the basin <S%H3595><s%> and its base; <S%H3653><s%>
the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> its pillars, <S%H5982><s%> their sockets, <S%H134><s%> and the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court; <S%H2691><s%>
the pins <S%H3489><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> the pins <S%H3489><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> and their cords; <S%H4340><s%>

the finely worked garments, <S%H899><s%> for ministering <S%H8278><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, <S%H6944><s%> the holy garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> to minister in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office.'"
All the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> departed <S%H3318><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

They came, <S%H935><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> stirred him up, <S%H5375><s%> and everyone whom his spirit <S%H7307><s%> made willing, <S%H5068><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s offering, <S%H8641><s%> for the work <S%H4399><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and for all of its service, <S%H5656><s%> and for the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments. <S%H899><s%>

They came, <S%H935><s%> both <S%H5921><s%> men <S%H582><s%> and women, <S%H802><s%> as many as <S%H3605><s%> were <S%H5081><s%> willing-hearted, <S%H3820><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> brooches, <S%H2397><s%> earrings, <S%H5141><s%> signet rings, <S%H2885><s%> and armlets, <S%H3558><s%> all jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold; <S%H2091><s%> even every man <S%H376><s%> who offered <S%H5130><s%> an offering <S%H8573><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Everyone, <S%H376><s%> with whom was found <S%H4672><s%> blue, <S%H8504><s%> purple, <S%H713><s%> scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair, <S%H352><s%> rams' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red, <S%H119><s%> and sea cow <S%H8476><s%> hides, <S%H5785><s%> brought them. <S%H935><s%>

Everyone who offered <S%H7311><s%> an offering <S%H8641><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> and brass <S%H5178><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s offering; <S%H8641><s%> and everyone, <S%H4672><s%> with whom was found acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> for any work <S%H4399><s%> of the service, <S%H5656><s%> brought it. <S%H935><s%>

All the women <S%H802><s%> who were <S%H2450><s%> wise-hearted <S%H3820><s%> spun <S%H2901><s%> with their hands, <S%H3027><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> that which they had spun, <S%H4299><s%> the blue, <S%H8504><s%> the purple, <S%H713><s%> the scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> and the fine linen. <S%H8336><s%>
All the women <S%H802><s%> whose heart <S%H3820><s%> stirred <S%H5375><s%> them up in wisdom <S%H2451><s%> spun <S%H2901><s%> the goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair.

The rulers <S%H5387><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> and the stones <S%H68><s%> to be set, <S%H4394><s%> for the ephod <S%H646><s%> and for the breastplate; <S%H2833><s%>
and the spice, <S%H1314><s%> and the oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light, <S%H3974><s%> for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and for the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense. <S%H7004><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> a freewill offering <S%H5071><s%> to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> and woman, <S%H802><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> made them willing <S%H5068><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> for all the work, <S%H4399><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> to be made <S%H6213><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Behold, <S%H7200><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has called <S%H7121><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%> Bezalel <S%H1212><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uri, <S%H221><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur, <S%H2354><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

He has filled <S%H4390><s%> him with the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> in wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> in understanding, <S%H8394><s%> in knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> and in all kinds of workmanship; <S%H4399><s%>
and to make <S%H2803><s%> skillful works, <S%H4284><s%> to work <S%H6213><s%> in gold, <S%H2091><s%> in silver, <S%H3701><s%> in brass, <S%H5178><s%>

in cutting <S%H2799><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%> for setting, <S%H4390><s%> and in carving <S%H2799><s%> of wood, <S%H6086><s%> to work <S%H6213><s%> in all kinds of skillful <S%H4284><s%> workmanship. <S%H4399><s%>

He has put <S%H5414><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%> that he may teach, <S%H3384><s%> both he, <S%H171><s%> and Oholiab, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahisamach, <S%H294><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan. <S%H1835><s%>

He has filled <S%H4390><s%> them with wisdom <S%H2451><s%> of heart, <S%H3820><s%> to work <S%H6213><s%> all kinds of workmanship, <S%H4399><s%> of the engraver, <S%H2796><s%> of the skillful workman, <S%H2803><s%> and of the embroiderer, <S%H7551><s%> in blue, <S%H8504><s%> in purple, <S%H713><s%> in scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> and in fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and of the weaver, <S%H707><s%> even of those who do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> workmanship, <S%H4399><s%> and of those who make <S%H2803><s%> skillful works. <S%H4399><s%>
